views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10

Classic makes your iOS 10 notifications look like iOS 7/8/9. Works on the Lockscreen, Notification Center, and Banners.

Classic also includes some options:

1. Enable/Disable
2. Remove white blur for semi-transparent dark look
3. Toggle Notification Headers
4. Changing allowed notification line amount.

Fully compatible with both iOS 10.1.1 and 10.2, be sure to toggle your version in settings.

A really tiny update that reflects my new Twitter username in the prefs panel. The biggest update to Classic since Classic 1.0!

This update is a full rewrite of Classic written from scratch. Version 1.1 was kind of a mess, so I decided to fix that. Here are some big changes I've made:

1. I now use different methods instead of layoutSubviews so my code isn't called over and over again. This should make this update like 50% faster on its own.

2. Settings are now handled differently so that when Classic is disabled, none of my code runs instead of using bools in every method. This should give a speed boost when enabled or disabled. It's a win-win.

3. Overall just fixed dumb and messy code.

If you're still using Classic, thank you! If you enjoy it, you can leave a donation in settings if you'd like. Thanks! :P
